title: Name that face!
content:
Does anybody recognize this one? Sort of a rippled inline, fun typeface. Any help is appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202053334im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/boller_4930.gif)

author: Tonie Blaze
